page.title: 04WATERSTOCK TRAINING CENTRE
page.content: Waterstock training centre is a beautiful modern building set in the Oxfordshire countryside.The training centre is owned by Lars and Diana Sederholm .Before it was used as a training centre it was a private house . It is 23 years old and has 50 stables.The oldest horse is 13 years old and called criket. The tallest horse is 17.1 hands.The smallest horse is 12.3 hands.They feed the horses 3 times each day.They give them hay and pony nuts.They train horses and people there.There is a man who teaches and he was in the olympic games last year.
